speaker: Doctor
text: Hi there! How have you been managing with your insulin pump lately?

speaker: Patient
text: It's been okay, but I've noticed my blood sugar levels are a bit higher after soccer practice.

speaker: Doctor
text: That can happen with increased activity. Have you tried adjusting your basal rate before practice?

speaker: Patient
text: I haven't yet. I'm not sure how much to adjust it by.

speaker: Doctor
text: We can work on that together. Let's look at your recent glucose readings and see if a temporary basal rate increase might help.

speaker: Patient
text: That sounds good. I want to make sure I'm doing it right.
